newsitem.title: FRANCE: LVMH sets 5.80 Ffr interim dividend.
newsitem.headline: LVMH sets 5.80 Ffr interim dividend.

text.p: Luxury goods group LVMH said its board had agreed to pay out on November 29 an interim 1996 dividend of 5.80 francs per share.
"This amount is not indicative of the sum of the dividend for the year," LVMH said in a statement.
It paid a dividend of 19.25 francs per share for 1995.
The group is expected to report its first-half results on Thursday morning.
